Title: Duplicate Advisory: Keras safe mode bypass vulnerability
Description:
### Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-c9rc-mg46-23w3. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

### Original Description
A safe mode bypass vulnerability in the `Model.load_model` method in Keras versions 3.0.0 through 3.10.0 allows an attacker to achieve arbitrary code execution by convincing a user to load a specially crafted `.keras` model archive.
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.11.0
